Title: Sesame Paste Ramen 5 Pack
Description:
Your favorite snack just got a lot healthier with our all natural ramen noodles with sesame paste. Featuring broad, flat noodles in a deliciously rich and savory sauce, it has all the traditional taste and quality of the classic dish without the fat and chemical preservatives. Our sesame paste ramen is made with simple, whole ingredients that were grown on a farm and not in a lab. Ready in minutes, these instant, broth-less noodles are high in protein and make a quick and convenient lunch, easy side dish or late night meal. Elevate your meal by incorporating some your favorite additions like garlic, cabbage, or chicken.
Made in Taiwan.
Made with
The noodles contain only wheat flour, sea salt and water, and our sauce is made from soy sauce, sesame paste, white sesame oil and citric acid.
Made without
Artificial colors, flavors or additives.
This product is all natural, vegan-friendly and contains no preservatives.
Ingredients
Noodles:  wheat flour, sea salt, water. Sauce: soy sauce (soybeans, water, sea salt, sugar), sesame paste, white sesame oil (soy oil, sesame oil) and citric acid.

Title: Organic Linden Flower Raw Honey
Description:
Sweeten your tea or açaí bowl with this 100% organic raw honey. Harvested from hives on the smooth slopes of Romania, this cold-extracted, coarsely filtered honey is packed with natural nutrients and flowery flavor. Not only is raw honey delicious, but it is also known for its health benefits such as soothing sore throats, aiding in digestion, and even improving cognitive function.
Product of Romania.
Made with
100% organic honey.

Made without
Artificial preservatives.

This honey is cold-extracted and coarsely filtered to maintain its nutrients.
Ingredients
Organic honey.

Title: Seaweed Snacks
Description:
Indulge in a healthy and flavorful snack with our crispy almond-sesame seaweed snacks. Made with premium-quality seaweed, almonds, black puffed rice, white sesame seeds, and soy sauce—these snacks offer a unique and delicious taste experience that you won't find anywhere else.
These seaweed snacks are high in fiber and protein, making them a filling and energizing snack that's perfect for any time of day. Plus, seaweed is naturally rich in iodine, a nutrient that's essential for thyroid health.
But what really sets our seaweed snacks apart is their irresistibly crunchy texture. Unlike greasy or heavy chips, our seaweed snacks are light, dry, and perfectly crispy. They make a great addition to cheese and charcuterie boards or a healthy alternative to traditional chips or crackers.
Made with
Maltose, black glutinous rice, seaweed, almond, white sesame, soy sauce (non-GMO soy beans, water, salt, sugar), salt.

Made without
monosodium glutamate, no excess oil as the snacks are baked.
Ingredients
Maltose, black glutinous rice, seaweed, almond, white sesame, soy sauce (non-GMO soy beans, water, salt, sugar), salt.

Made with the highest quality, non-GMO veggies, including white carrot, orange sweet potato and red beetroot, they're a healthy, light alternative to traditionally over-salted, oily potato chips. Title: Candied Pecans
Description:
These candied pecans are a truly irresistible snack that's perfect for any occasion. Buttery, crispy, with just the right amount of sugar and southern charm, these treats are sure to satisfy your sweet tooth. Originally popularized in New Orleans, this decadent snack has a rich history that dates back to the area's famous praline recipes.

Mix them with popcorn for a sweet and savory movie night treat or toss them with roasted vegetables and salads for a delicious crunch — there are so many ways to enjoy!

But here's the best part: not only do the candied pecans taste amazing, they're also packed with healthy nutrients. Pecans are an excellent source of vitamin E, beta-carotene, and zinc, making them a much healthier alternative to other sugary treats.

Description:

An excellent sweetener, use the agave syrup in cooking and baking as a substitute for honey, maple syrup or sugar. It dissolves quickly in cold drinks and makes especially good iced tea or coffee.

These pecans are made with a unique blend of cayenne pepper, pasilla chile, and pure cane sugar, which creates a perfect balance of sweet and spicy flavors. Handcrafted in small batches in California, our sweet and spicy pecans are made with the highest quality ingredients to ensure a gourmet taste that serious spice lovers will appreciate. They're not just a great snack on their own, but also a versatile ingredient that can be added to your favorite dishes like roasted veggies, salads, baked potatoes and more.

Description:
Looking for a healthy and delicious snack that satisfies your sweet tooth? Look no further than these chocolate covered almonds! Roasted to perfection and coated with a delicious bittersweet chocolate, these almonds create a unique and satisfying flavor experience. Not only are they a tasty treat, but they're also a nutritional powerhouse, packed with protein, vitamins, and antioxidants.

These chocolate covered almonds are versatile, too. Sprinkle them on top of your favorite salad for a crunchy and chocolatey addition, or mix them with dried fruit, seeds, and other nuts to create a delicious trail mix for on-the-go snacking. Title: Fry Pan - Small
Description:
A frying pan with top-quality oil absorption and heat storage properties, making food crispy and delicious. Features excellent heat conductivity and circulation, perfect for high temperature cooking such as stir-frying.
User Guide: PDF (2.6MB)
Product details:
['Measurements:

\n
\nVolume: 1.3 L (33.8 fl oz)', 'Country/Region of Origin: Japan']
Materials & care:
['Body: Nitrided Steel (bottom thickness 1.6mm)
Handle: Nitrided Steel
Rivets: Nickel-plated Steel', '- Oven-safe.

- NOT dishwasher-safe.

- Do NOT put it in the microwave.

- Compatible heat sources: Induction cookers, gas stoves, radiant heaters, sheath heaters, oven.

[Tips For Use]

① Before using the frying pan for the first time, please "season" it with oil. The surface of an iron frying pan has many small holes. Oil will penetrate these holes and form a thin film of oil on the pan's surface. The key is to heat the oil slowly over medium heat or lower so that it is evenly heated throughout. When the oil is absorbed into the frying pan, it becomes less likely to stick and rust.

② From the second time onwards, please “return the oil” before cooking. When you first start using the frying pan, the oil will not be absorbed into the frying pan, so the food will stick to the frying pan. To prevent sticking, please return the food to the pan with oil. After that, add oil to the pan and start cooking to reduce sticking.

③ Wash with hot water without using detergent. After cooking, while the frying pan is still warm, use a scrubbing brush or bamboo scourer to wash it with hot water without detergent. After washing, drain the water, dry well, and then apply a thin layer of oil to the inside and outside of the frying pan using kitchen paper.']

Title: BALMUDA The Toaster
Description:
BALMUDA The Toaster features a revolutionary technology that combines steam with precise heat control. Its five unique heat modes are designed to bring out the best in any dish.

Steam technology: Simply pour five cc’s of water at the start of each toast. Heating more rapidly than air, a thin layer of steam envelops the bread, lightly toasting its surface, while keeping its inner moisture and flavor from escaping.

Temperature regulation: Precise control of three temperature zones creates superb contrasts of flavor and texture. This will ensure a crisp and savory surface, while retaining a moist and fluffy inside.

Five modes: BALMUDA The Toaster features a Sandwich Bread Mode, Artisan Bread Mode, Pizza Mode, and a Pastry Mode — all specially designed to meet your specific bread needs.

It also has an Oven Mode, which offers three heat settings (350, 400, 450 degrees) to be used to prepare small dishes just like a traditional oven.

Clean compact design: Sleek design and compact in size, BALMUDA The Toaster is a welcome addition to any kitchen décor or countertop.
SEE MORE DETAILS

Title: Men's Cool Touch Pique Button Down Short Sleeve Polo Shirt
Description:
Stay cool & protected on bright, hot days with our Men's Cool Touch Pique Button Down Short Sleeve Polo Shirt.
Designed with function and style in mind, this polo is made with a tightly twisted organic cotton yarn that helps you stay cool and protected from UV rays. The fabric is light yet firm, with a pique weave for a unique texture. It is also quick drying and crease-resistant for easy care.
Versatile for a variety of occasions, this shirt is ideal for everyday wear and smart casual wear. Put together an outfit with our Bottoms or layer under our Jackets for rainy days and more formal attire.
[What is Cool Touch?]
We use a unique cotton or polyester yarn shape to increase thermal conductivity so that the fabric can quickly absorb heat and diffuse sweat, creating a cold contact feel.
The knitting process and the unique thread shape also makes the fabric reflect UV rays, effective in protecting the skin.

Materials & care:

- Blocks over 90% of UV rays.

- No change in effectiveness after being washed as directed up to 10 times.

- The UV cut effect varies depending on the colour and pattern of the fabric. The UV cut effect may decrease when used outdoors for a long time.']

Title: Women's Stretchy Hemp Mix Jumpsuit
Description:
Spring into effortless and sustainable style with our Women's Stretchy Hemp Mix Jumpsuit. The hemp texture and spandex allows for freer movement and a relaxed feel with its moderately stretchy material and comfortable all-day wear while staying stylish. It comes with a belt so you can change the silhouette depending on your mood.
Go on a picnic with friends and celebrate the good weather or wear it on your next office day.
Try pairing it with our Sneaker Sandals for a sporty and urban look.
[What is Hemp]

Hemp is a natural fiber that can be cultivated with minimal environmental impact. It needs little to no irrigation and uses less fertilizer than other crops.
Getting more attention as a new alternative to linen and cotton, hemp, which has been used in Japan for the thongs of geta for a long time, has excellent breathability and quick-drying properties.

Title: Women's Hemp Blend V-Neck Sweater
Description:
A V-neck sweater knitted with eco-friendly hemp and elastic yarn for a soft, light texture. This sweater helps protect your skin and blocks over 80% of UV rays, due to hemp's natural resistance to UV light.

[What is Hemp]

Hemp is a natural fiber that can be cultivated with minimal environmental impact. It needs little to no irrigation and uses less fertilizer than other crops.
Getting more attention as a new alternative to linen and cotton, hemp, which has been used in Japan for the thongs of geta for a long time, has excellent breathability and quick-drying properties.

Title: Korean Style Spicy Sesame Sauce
Description:
A blend of gochujang, a staple of Korean BBQ, and tasty sesame. This sweet and salty sauce with a punch of garlic and ginger and the richness of sesame is perfect for BBQ as well as for fried chicken and other meat dishes! Use it also as a dipping sauce for noodles or as a sauce for stir-fry dishes. Mix it with mayonnaise and try using it as a dip for vegetables and nuggets!

INGREDIENTS: Water, Cane Sugar, Chili Paste [rice, corn syrup, red pepper powder, salt, soybeans, alcohol, wheat extract, soy seasoning (wheat gluten, yeast extract, maltodextrin), garlic concentrate, koji-starter], Gluten-free Soy Sauce (soybeans, salt, alcohol), Tomato Paste, Apple Cider Vinegar, Sesame Seeds, Toasted Sesame Oil, Garlic, Sea Salt, Ginger Root, Chili Pepper, Lemon Juice Concentrate
ALLERGEN INFORMATION
CONTAINS: SOY, WHEAT, SESAME
PRODUCT DETAILS
Shipping Weight: 14.3 oz
Volume: 14.3 oz (405.4 g)

Title: BALMUDA The Toaster
Description:
BALMUDA The Toaster features a revolutionary technology that combines steam with precise heat control. Its five unique heat modes are designed to bring out the best in any dish.

Steam technology: Simply pour five cc’s of water at the start of each toast. Heating more rapidly than air, a thin layer of steam envelops the bread, lightly toasting its surface, while keeping its inner moisture and flavor from escaping.

Temperature regulation: Precise control of three temperature zones creates superb contrasts of flavor and texture. This will ensure a crisp and savory surface, while retaining a moist and fluffy inside.

Five modes: BALMUDA The Toaster features a Sandwich Bread Mode, Artisan Bread Mode, Pizza Mode, and a Pastry Mode — all specially designed to meet your specific bread needs.

It also has an Oven Mode, which offers three heat settings (350, 400, 450 degrees) to be used to prepare small dishes just like a traditional oven.

Clean compact design: Sleek design and compact in size, BALMUDA The Toaster is a welcome addition to any kitchen décor or countertop.
SEE MORE DETAILS
One year warranty available for manufacture defects. Contact Balmuda USA for their Warranty and Repair Policy.

Title: Wool Felt Animal - Sheep
Description:
These wool felt animals are developed in one of MUJI's global initiatives helping developing countries to share their traditional culture or skill with the world. Read more about our One Village One Product Project.
Using wool from Kyrgyzstan, the shape is formed by repeatedly poking the wool with a needle in a process called needle felting.
Kyrgyzstan is known as the Alps of Central Asia for its rich natural beauty and comfortable climate. The families living in the scattered villages have since ancient times made their living through nomadic pastoralism and the production of wool felt.
 
[ About Found MUJI ]
'Searching and Finding’ has been MUJI’s perspective on daily life since the beginning. Instead of creating new products from scratch, much-loved everyday items are found from around the world. MUJI adapts these traditions, knowledge, and cultures to this collection of products known as Found MUJI.

H8.5 x W12 x D5 cm (H3.3 x W4.7 x D2")', 'Country/Region of Origin: Kyrgyzstan']
Materials & care:
['100% Wool', '- As each item is processed by hand, there may be variations in size, distortion, twist, color, texture, etc. for each item.

- As it is a natural material, it has a unique smell. In addition, impurities derived from raw materials may be mixed in.

- Please be careful not to pull too hard as it may break or break.

- Please use and store out of reach of small children.

- Cannot be washed. If it gets dirty, wipe it with a cloth soaked in diluted neutral detergent and wring it out thoroughly.

- Dark-colored products may transfer color due to friction during use or contact in wet conditions.']

Title: Wool Felt Animal - Argali
Description:
These wool felt animals are developed in one of MUJI's global initiatives helping developing countries to share their traditional culture or skill with the world. Read more about our One Village One Product Project.
Using wool from Kyrgyzstan, the shape is formed by repeatedly poking the wool with a needle in a process called needle felting.
Kyrgyzstan is known as the Alps of Central Asia for its rich natural beauty and comfortable climate. The families living in the scattered villages have since ancient times made their living through nomadic pastoralism and the production of wool felt.
 
[ About Found MUJI ]
'Searching and Finding’ has been MUJI’s perspective on daily life since the beginning. Instead of creating new products from scratch, much-loved everyday items are found from around the world. MUJI adapts these traditions, knowledge, and cultures to this collection of products known as Found MUJI.

Title: Malay Grass Open Toe Slippers
Description:
These unique slippers are crafted from Malay grass which changes into a amber color over time and use. The thick and flat strands of Malay Grass features relatively high tensile strength and is dried for use in different weaving applications. 
Ideal for the summer, as the material absorbs sweat from your feet keeping them dry and comfortable. The under sole is durable and easy to clean.

Sock: 100% Malay Grass
Outer Sole: Synthetic Sole', '- If the product gets dirty, pat the dirt or stain with a towel soaked in a diluted detergent. Then wipe off the detergent with a wet towel and dry immediately.

- Do not use in places that may get slippery such as bathrooms, balconies or other places.

- Color transfer of dark-colored products may occur during use due to friction and when handling while wet.

- Regularly check and care for the product as the ends of hard fibers may poke out during use. When the fibers stick out, either cut them off at the base, or push them back in.

- Due to the characteristics of the material, fluffing and pilling may occur from friction. The fluff and fabric pills may come off and adhere to other objects.']

Title: Cool Touch Patterned Scarf with Pocket
Description:
A light scarf that is smooth and soft, made with eucalyptus lyocell. It features a pocket that can be used to store ice packs to keep you cool in the summer.

Title: Kapok Blend Bucket Hat Natural
Description:
A bucket hat made from natural kapok fibre, an environmentally friendly plant grown without pesticides. By using a fabric that mixes kapok with cotton, it is softer and lighter than conventional 100% cotton. A hidden adjustable strap allows the hat to adapt for a better fit.
[What is Kapok]
The fiber harvested from kapok nuts is a material with minimal environmental impact that can be cultivated with little fertilizer and water without pesticides. Because the fiber inside is hollow, it is light and contains a lot of air.

Title: Less Tiring Slip-On Sneakers Off White
Description:
Comfortable and casual canvas slip-on sneakers with a cushioned insole for all-day support. Made with organic cotton, the fabric is treated with a water-repellent finish making these shoes suitable for rainy days.
Good to know: Our sneakers are made for unisex with a wider width. Thus, we suggest going half size down when you purchase our sneakers. If you usually wear US Women's 8, you can size down to US Women's 7.5.
 
Size Chart
Women's 8.5
Product details:
['Style Code: EDC0223S / EBC0223S', 'Measurements:
', 'Country/Region of Origin: Cambodia']
Materials & care:
['Upper: 100% Cotton

Sole: Rubber Sole', '- The shoes can be slippery on a wet road. Use extreme caution.

- Stop wearing this product immediately if you suffer from rashes or itching.

- Choose shoes fit for the purpose you will use them for, and avoid using them for purposes other than the intended one. Doing so may cause unexpected injuries from falls, etc.

- When cleaning the outer surface, use water with some neutral detergent to remove dirt and then wipe with a wet cloth. Do not use shoe cream.
- Dry in the shade.

- Avoid using in an oily place if possible.

- Water repellency will gradually decrease with use.']

- Water repellency will gradually get lost during use.']

Description:

The fabric is knitted with a polyester yarn, resulting in a breathable, cool-touch feeling when worn, ideal for wearing for exercise and workouts, and while playing sports. We use a unique cotton or polyester yarn shape to increase thermal conductivity so that the fabric can quickly absorb heat and diffuse sweat, creating a cold contact feel.

Title: Lip Brush
Description:
A lip brush that has just the right amount of firmness to apply makeup products smoothly and evenly.
After each use, wipe the brush on a tissue on a flat surface to clean.

◎ How to Clean: Put lukewarm water in a bowl and add a small amount of neutral clothing detergent. Soak about 2/3 of the brush bristles and remove the dirt so that it will be loosened. Be careful not to get the base of the brush wet. After rinsing and removing the detergent, pat dry with tissue, shape it, and dry it in the shade until completely dry. Please note that insufficient drying may cause the growth of germs.

['Measurements:

- Be careful not to wash too much as the brush will wear out faster.

- Be careful not to crush the ends of the bristles when you carry it in a pouch.

- This product smells of polyester fiber.

- Make sure that the mouthpiece does not come into direct contact with your skin.

- Do not use if you have an abnormality on your skin.

- If you feel any abnormality on your skin, immediately discontinue the specifications and consult a dermatologist.

- Store away from fire, in direct sunlight, and in places with high temperatures and humidity.

Title: Polyester Cheek Brush
Description:
A large-size cheek brush made of polyester fiber that is soft on the skin. Perfect for applying blushes, bronzers, or for contouring.
After each use, wipe the brush on a tissue on a flat surface to clean.
 
◎ How to Use: Soak an appropriate amount of cheek color or loose powder in the brush. Adjust the amount of powder with tissue paper before applying it to the skin for a natural finish.
Product details:
['Measurements:
16.4 cm (approx. 6.5")', 'Country/Region of Origin: China']
Materials & care:
['Brush: PBT Resin
Base: Aluminum
Handle: AS Resin', '- Do not let the handle get wet as much as possible.

- Be careful not to wash too much as the brush will wear out faster.

- When drying, hang it with the brush part down or lay it horizontally on the tissue.

- Be careful not to crush the ends of the bristles when you carry it in a pouch.

- This product smells of polyester fiber.

- Do not use if you have an abnormality on your skin.

- If you feel any abnormality on your skin, immediately discontinue the specifications and consult a dermatologist.

- If it is deformed or damaged, stop using it immediately.

- Store away from fire, in direct sunlight, and in places with high temperatures and humidity.

- Keep out of reach of children.']

Title: Women's Cool Touch Broadcloth Stand Collar Patterned Short Sleeve Dress
Description:
Stay cool this summer with our Women's Cool Touch Broadcloth Stand Collar Short Sleeve Dress. Made from organic cotton, this dress features a comfortable and lightweight cool touch material that has a soft and firm texture. Whether buttoned up as a dress or worn open as a layering piece, this sustainable choice is sure to keep you feeling good all season long.
[What is Cool Touch?]
We use a cotton yarn to increase thermal conductivity so that the fabric can quickly absorb heat and diffuse sweat, creating a cold contact feel.

Title: Women's Stretchy Hemp Mix Jumpsuit
Description:
Spring into effortless and sustainable style with our Women's Stretchy Hemp Mix Jumpsuit. The hemp texture and spandex allows for freer movement and a relaxed feel with its moderately stretchy material and comfortable all-day wear while staying stylish. It comes with a belt so you can change the silhouette depending on your mood.
Go on a picnic with friends and celebrate the good weather or wear it on your next office day.
Try pairing it with our Sneaker Sandals for a sporty and urban look.
[What is Hemp]

Hemp is a natural fiber that can be cultivated with minimal environmental impact. It needs little to no irrigation and uses less fertilizer than other crops.
Getting more attention as a new alternative to linen and cotton, hemp, which has been used in Japan for the thongs of geta for a long time, has excellent breathability and quick-drying properties.

Title: Shampoo 12 fl oz
Description:
MUJI By Public Goods gentle shampoo is powered by a blend of essential oils that nourishes and cleanses your hair. Made without using harsh detergents and chemicals that strip away, dry out, and erode the health of your hair. MUJI By Public Goods shampoo leaves your locks visibly stronger and radiant with a natural, fresh scent of bright grapefruit, juicy mandarin, and Mediterranean herbs.

Made with: Essential oils of orange, geranium, cinnamon, mandarin, nutmeg, petitgrain, rosewood, celery seed, grapefruit, and vetiver.

Made without: Parabens, synthetic fragrance, sodium lauryl sulfates, phthalates, and anything derived from formaldehyde.

We don’t believe in animal testing; this product is vegan-friendly.
Ingredients:
Paraben Free. Sulfate Free. Gluten Free. Natural Fragrance. Vegan Friendly. Cruelty Free.
Made in New Jersey.

Title: Hand Soap 12 fl oz
Description:
MUJI By Public Goods gentle liquid hand soap is powered by a blend of essential oils that are hard working on dirt but gentle on your skin. Using a non-irritating formula is designed to keep your skin smooth and hydrated while protecting you from germs and whatever else you may have picked up throughout the day. With a delicate scent of fresh grapefruit and juicy mandarin, MUJI By Public Goods liquid hand soap is an elevated everyday essential.

Made with: Essential oils of orange, geranium, cinnamon, mandarin, nutmeg, petitgrain, rosewood, celery seed, grapefruit, and vetiver.

Title: Reed Diffuser - Rose Blend
Description: The reed diffusers release a steady stream of fragrance into the air - perfect for your bedroom, living room or other common space.  Safe for living spaces with children since this operates without an open flame.
Product details:
['Measurements:
Volume: 6.0 fl oz (Approx. 180 ml)', 'Country/Region of Origin: ']
Materials & care:
['Ingredients: 1,2-Isopropylideneglycerol (IPG), Rosa Damascena (Rose)', '- Keep your reed diffuser away from heat and flame.

- Keep out of reach of children and pets.

- Do not swallow.

- May be harmful or fatal if swallowed.

- Avoid contact with eyes, skin and hair.

- Avoid contact with furniture, fabrics and finished surfaces.

- Spillage may cause staining.

Directions:
- Gently and slowly pull out the cap on the bottle and place your reed sticks in for a few minutes to absorb the diffuser oil.
- Flip the saturated ends of the sticks up so the fragrance will begin to naturally permeate your space.
- Continue to Flip every few days to keep the scent fresh and fragrant.
- Regularly replace reed sticks as needed.']

Stay cool this summer with our Cool Touch Broadcloth Flared Skirt. Designed with function and style in mind, cool touch fabric is made with a tightly twisted organic cotton yarn for a soft, light, and firm texture.
Pair it with our Tops & Shirts for a smart casual look. Accessorize with our Hats for every day travels.
[What is Cool Touch?]

We use a unique cotton or polyester yarn shape to increase thermal conductivity so that the fabric can quickly absorb heat and diffuse sweat, creating a cold contact feel.

The knitting process and the unique thread shape also makes the fabric reflect UV rays, effective in protecting the skin.

Title: Women's Stretchy Hemp Mix Straight Pants
Description:
Hemp-textured straight pants made with a moderately stretchy material for a comfortable fit.
[What is Hemp]

Hemp is a natural fiber that can be cultivated with minimal environmental impact. It needs little to no irrigation and uses less fertilizer than other crops.
Getting more attention as a new alternative to linen and cotton, hemp, which has been used in Japan for the thongs of geta for a long time, has excellent breathability and quick-drying properties.

Title: Women's Kapok Blend Tucked Pants
Description:
Relaxed-fit tucked, elastic waist pants made with a blend of organic cotton and kapok, an environmentally friendly plant grown without pesticides. By using a fabric that mixes kapok with cotton, it is softer and lighter than conventional 100% cotton.
The straight-leg design makes it easy to style with anything casual.
[What is Kapok]
The fiber harvested from kapok nuts is a material with minimal environmental impact that can be cultivated with little fertilizer and water without pesticides. Because the fiber inside is hollow, it is light and contains a lot of air.

Title: Pocket Tissue
Description:
MUJI By Public Goods tree free pocket tissues are a softer, more sustainable alternative to standard tissues. Made from fast-growing non-GMO grasses (bamboo and sugarcane) rather than hardwoods, our tissues offer comfort and care on-the-go while preserving natural resources. Gentle and strong 2-ply tissues with 50% less lint than traditional tissues, these pocket tissues are also great for cleaning smudges off mobile phones and eyewear. Safe for sensitive and allergy prone skin.

Made with: 10 pocked-sized packs, non-GMO Certified bamboo and sugarcane processed with elemental chlorine free (ECF) bleaching.

Made without: trees of any kind, inks, dyes, fragrances and BPA.

No trees or animals were harmed in the making of this product. 100% biodegradable.
Tree Free. Made with Bamboo. Bio-degradable.
Made in China.

Title: Korean Style Spicy Sesame Sauce
Description:
A blend of gochujang, a staple of Korean BBQ, and tasty sesame. This sweet and salty sauce with a punch of garlic and ginger and the richness of sesame is perfect for BBQ as well as for fried chicken and other meat dishes! Use it also as a dipping sauce for noodles or as a sauce for stir-fry dishes. Mix it with mayonnaise and try using it as a dip for vegetables and nuggets!

INGREDIENTS: Water, Cane Sugar, Chili Paste [rice, corn syrup, red pepper powder, salt, soybeans, alcohol, wheat extract, soy seasoning (wheat gluten, yeast extract, maltodextrin), garlic concentrate, koji-starter], Gluten-free Soy Sauce (soybeans, salt, alcohol), Tomato Paste, Apple Cider Vinegar, Sesame Seeds, Toasted Sesame Oil, Garlic, Sea Salt, Ginger Root, Chili Pepper, Lemon Juice Concentrate
ALLERGEN INFORMATION
CONTAINS: SOY, WHEAT, SESAME

Title: Japan: The Cookbook
Description:
More than 400 authentic Japanese recipes for the home cook from bestselling author Nancy Singleton Hachisu
Japan: The Cookbook has more than 400 sumptuous recipes by acclaimed food writer Nancy Singleton Hachisu. The iconic and regional traditions of Japan are organized by course and contain insightful notes alongside the recipes. The dishes - soups, noodles, rice, pickles, one-pots, sweets, and vegetables - are simple and elegant.

Title: Gastronogeek Anime Cookbook
Description:
40 recipes dedicated to anime and inspired by the greatest works of recent years, from Naruto to Attack on Titan, from chef and pop-culture expert, Thibaud Villanova, author of The Unofficial Zelda Cookbook and The Unofficial Ghibli Cookbook.
Dive into an incredible gourmet universe of anime, from the great classics of the 80s to newcomers on the small screen.
Re-discover the most essential and popular works of the moment in this collection in the most gourmet way possible, from the One Piece Sanji and Tajiro Curry to the Your Name Dream Souffle Pancakes!

Title: Japan: The Vegetarian Cookbook
Description:
'Extraordinary ... a must-have book for anyone who loves vegetables!' - Amanda Cohen, James Beard-nominated chef and owner of Dirt Candy.
From the author of global bestseller Japan: The Cookbook, more than 250 delicious, healthy vegetarian Japanese recipes for home cooks.
In this collection of new recipes, Nancy Singleton Hachisu, the most authoritative voice in Japanese home cooking today, showcases Japanese vegetarian dishes, bringing the exquisite flavors of the nation's elegant cuisine to those who follow a plant-based diet or want to lower the amount of fish and meat they eat.
Recipes are divided by cooking style - dressed, vinegared, deep-fried, simmered, steamed, stir-fried, grilled, pickled, and sweet - alongside which Hachisu shares her expert knowledge of the ingredients, culture, and traditions of this unique culinary style.
 
Author: Hachisu, Nancy Singleton
Publisher: Phaidon Press Ltd
Hardcover: 368 pages
Dimensions: 7.4 x 1.4 x 11.0" (18.9 x 3.5 x 27.9 cm)
Language: English

Title: Tokyo Cult Recipes (mini)
Description:
International bestseller now in new gift format!
A celebration of food, culture and place, here are 100 dishes from Tokyo, the gastronomic megacity.
If you want sushi, miso soup, gyoza, ramen, donburi, bento, tonkatsu, lotus root chips, mochi or a yuzu sorbet ... they're all here. Plus features on essential cooking techniques and key ingredients, making it truly Japanese food made simple.

Title: A Day in Tokyo: A Japanese Cookbook
Description:
The best of Tokyo cuisine and culture, from AM to PM.
A Day in Tokyo is a culinary journey through one of the world's most vibrant cities.
From the bustling streets of Shinjuku to the hidden corners of Ueno, this book takes you on a delicious food adventure from breakfast through to dinner, showcasing the diverse tastes and ingredients of Japanese cuisine. Start the day with unbelievably fluffy Funwari Hottokeki, dive into some Tokyo-born Yakisoba Pan for a much-earned midday break and end the night with crunchy and tender Tonkatsu.
Capture the delicious flavors of Tokyo at home with 96 recipes and insider tips on where to find the best local eats. A Day in Tokyo is the ultimate book for food and travel enthusiasts.
 
Authors: Liew, Brendan / Ng, Caryn
Publisher: Smith Street Books
Hardcover: 240 pages
Dimensions: 7 x 1.1 x 9.4" (17.7 x 2.8 x 23.8 cm)
Language: ﻿English

Title: Less Tiring Sneakers - Off White
Description:
Comfortable and casual canvas sneakers with a cushioned insole for all-day support. The fabric is treated with a water repellent finish making these shoes suitable for rainy days.
Good to know: Our sneakers are made for unisex with a wider width. Thus, we suggest going half size down when you purchase our sneakers. If you usually wear US Women's 8, you can size down to US Women's 7.5.

Size Chart
Women's 8.5
Product details:
['Style Code: EBC01A3S / EDC01A3S', 'Measurements:
See the item size chart above.', 'Country/Region of Origin: Cambodia']
Materials & care:
['Upper: 100% Cotton
Sole: Rubber Sole', '- The shoes can be slippery on a wet floor or road. Use extreme caution.

- Stop wearing this product immediately if you suffer from rashes or itching.

- Keep away from fire, as this may cause deformation or softening.

- Avoid using in an oily place if possible.

- Children should be supervised when using this product.

- If this product gets wet, wipe immediately with a dry cloth and dry in the shade in a place with good ventilation.

- Please choose shoes that are suitable for your intended activity. Avoid using them other than for their intended purpose, as this can cause injuries.

- Water repellency will gradually get lost during use.
']

Title: Body Fit Cushion - Polyester Plain Weave Cover (Body sold separately)
Description:
The polyester plain weave cover is weaved in a cross pattern and has canvas-like thickness and coarseness to keep the cushion supportive when you use it.
Two types of fabrics are used: stretchy knit fabric and non-stretch fabric, so you can choose the comfort of sitting depending on how you place it. If you place it vertically, it spreads in a circular shape and sinks deeply into it, making it perfect for a nap. When placed on its side, it hugs you from the waist to your neck, keeping you in the right position, perfect for reading or watching TV.
The knitted fabric uses a fabric that does not stretch easily, even when used. The fabric is made of polyester with a heathered finish. The material is easy to care for. It has a brushed finish, so it feels good on the skin. It is a simple color that easily blends in with the room.
Please note the zipper pull is omitted for safety reasons. We recommend using a paperclip to zip and unzip your cover.
*Product images are for reference only. Actual product color might differ slightly due to the image quality.

Title: Essential Oil Reed Diffuser - French Lavender
Description:
Our Essential Oil Reed Diffusers are created using 100% natural plant-based ingredients. Unlike fragrance oil reed diffusers, which contain synthetic ingredients, the essential oils in our diffusers are gentler and provide a subtle scent.
The reed diffusers release a steady stream of fragrance into the air - perfect for your bedroom, living room or other common space. Safe for living spaces with children since this operates without an open flame.

*Rattan Sticks Sold Separately.
Product details:
['Measurements:
Volume: 6.0 fl oz (Approx. 180 ml)', 'Country/Region of Origin: USA']
Materials & care:
['Ingredients: Coconut Oil, Lavender

', '- Keep your reed diffuser away from heat and flame.

- Keep out of reach of children and pets.

- Do not swallow.

- May be harmful or fatal if swallowed.

- Avoid contact with eyes, skin and hair.

- Avoid contact with furniture, fabrics and finished surfaces.

- Spillage may cause staining.

Directions:
- Unscrew the cap on the bottle and place your reed sticks in for a few minutes to absorb the diffuser oil.
- Flip the saturated ends of the sticks up so the fragrance will begin to naturally permeate your space.
- Continue to flip every few days to keep the scent fresh and fragrant.
- Regularly replace reed sticks as needed.']

Title: Kapok Blend Bucket Hat Indigo Blue
Description:
A bucket hat made from natural kapok fiber, an environmentally friendly plant grown without pesticides. By using a fabric that mixes kapok with cotton, it is softer and lighter than conventional 100% cotton. A hidden adjustable strap allows the hat to adapt for a better fit.
[What is Kapok]
The fiber harvested from kapok nuts is a material with minimal environmental impact that can be cultivated with little fertilizer and water without pesticides. Because the fiber inside is hollow, it is light and contains a lot of air.

Title: IDÉE Original Marche Bag - Botanical
Description:
A Marche Bag with two openings, illustrated with a rustic, botanical motif.

It can be used as your main daily bag or folded and stored compactly as a sub-bag. With the two openings, you can easily organize your items, making it a versatile bag. There is also a convenient inner pocket to store smaller items that tend to lose in your bag.

[About IDÉE]

The theme of IDÉE is "exploration of life, adventure of hobby". As a sub-brand under MUJI, IDÉE aims to live and enjoy life with a sense of beauty.

Always challenge new things and keep changing without being bound by one style or sense of values. At the same time, we believe that there is a discovery of a new life in these two attitudes, pursuing something indelible and a beautiful form that never changes.

In addition to handling miscellaneous goods, art, books, etc., selected from Japan and overseas, mainly original furniture, IDÉE is also involved in cafes and green shops. In addition, from the perspective of designing people's living comfort, we create various spaces such as residences, offices, and shops.

Title: Adjustable Handle Hard Shell Suitcase 36L - Khaki Green | Carry-On
Description: This best-selling luggage gets an eco-friendly upgrade and a sleek new appearance with a flatter, matte texture. Its spacious 36L capacity is ideal for packing everything you need for a 3-day trip. Plus, it includes a wheel stopper feature and an adjustable handle for convenience. The material has been carefully reviewed and the weight has been reduced from previous models, giving you the ability to bring even more belongings. The twin-wheel caster runs smoothly and quietly, and the built-in TSA-approved lock means you won't have to worry about airport security breaking a padlock while inspecting your luggage.

Title: Veggie Chips
Description:
These thin, crispy veggie chips are an uncommonly good and good-for-you snack. Made with the highest quality, non-GMO veggies, including white carrot, orange sweet potato and red beetroot, they're a healthy, light alternative to traditionally over-salted, oily potato chips. Try these veggie chips with hummus, guacamole or straight out of the bag. These brightly colored snacks are sure to please however you enjoy them.

Made in Ecuador.

Title: Sweet & Spicy Pecans
Description:
Elevate your snacking game with these sweet and spicy pecans, a delicious and healthy treat that satisfies your craving for a flavorful and crunchy snack. These pecans are made with a unique blend of cayenne pepper, pasilla chile, and pure cane sugar, which creates a perfect balance of sweet and spicy flavors. They're also Kosher, gluten-free and non-GMO, making them a wholesome snack for everyone.

Handcrafted in small batches in California, our sweet and spicy pecans are made with the highest quality ingredients to ensure a gourmet taste that serious spice lovers will appreciate. They're not just a great snack on their own, but also a versatile ingredient that can be added to your favorite dishes like roasted veggies, salads, baked potatoes and more.
Made in California.

Title: Candied Pecans
Description:
These candied pecans are a truly irresistible snack that's perfect for any occasion. Buttery, crispy, with just the right amount of sugar and southern charm, these treats are sure to satisfy your sweet tooth. Originally popularized in New Orleans, this decadent snack has a rich history that dates back to the area's famous praline recipes.

Mix them with popcorn for a sweet and savory movie night treat or toss them with roasted vegetables and salads for a delicious crunch — there are so many ways to enjoy!

But here's the best part: not only do the candied pecans taste amazing, they're also packed with healthy nutrients. Pecans are an excellent source of vitamin E, beta-carotene, and zinc, making them a much healthier alternative to other sugary treats.

Title: Sesame Paste Ramen 5 Pack
Description: Your favorite snack just got a lot healthier with our all natural ramen noodles with sesame paste. Featuring broad, flat noodles in a deliciously rich and savory sauce, it has all the traditional taste and quality of the classic dish without the fat and chemical preservatives. Our sesame paste ramen is made with simple, whole ingredients that were grown on a farm and not in a lab. Ready in minutes, these instant, broth-less noodles are high in protein and make a quick and convenient lunch, easy side dish or late night meal. Elevate your meal by incorporating some your favorite additions like garlic, cabbage, or chicken.

Title: Seaweed Snacks
Description:
Indulge in a healthy and flavorful snack with our crispy almond-sesame seaweed snacks. Made with premium-quality seaweed, almonds, black puffed rice, white sesame seeds, and soy sauce—these snacks offer a unique and delicious taste experience that you won't find anywhere else.
These seaweed snacks are high in fiber and protein, making them a filling and energizing snack that's perfect for any time of day. Plus, seaweed is naturally rich in iodine, a nutrient that's essential for thyroid health.
But what really sets our seaweed snacks apart is their irresistibly crunchy texture. Unlike greasy or heavy chips, our seaweed snacks are light, dry, and perfectly crispy. They make a great addition to cheese and charcuterie boards or a healthy alternative to traditional chips or crackers.

Title: Chocolate Almonds
Description:
Looking for a healthy and delicious snack that satisfies your sweet tooth? Look no further than these chocolate covered almonds! Roasted to perfection and coated with a delicious bittersweet chocolate, these almonds create a unique and satisfying flavor experience. Not only are they a tasty treat, but they're also a nutritional powerhouse, packed with protein, vitamins, and antioxidants.

These chocolate covered almonds are versatile, too. Sprinkle them on top of your favorite salad for a crunchy and chocolatey addition, or mix them with dried fruit, seeds, and other nuts to create a delicious trail mix for on-the-go snacking. And they're not just good for you — they also look beautiful on dessert and fruit trays and make a great gourmet gift for any chocolate lover.

Title: Organic Agave Syrup
Description:
This premium, organic agave syrup is made from the light, sweet nectar of the blue agave plant. As well as registering low on the glycemic index, it's also a good, natural source of vitamins B and C. An excellent sweetener, use the agave syrup in cooking and baking as a substitute for honey, maple syrup or sugar. It dissolves quickly in cold drinks and makes especially good iced tea or coffee.

Harvested from hives on the smooth slopes of Romania, this cold-extracted, coarsely filtered honey is packed with natural nutrients and flowery flavor. Not only is raw honey delicious, but it is also known for its health benefits such as soothing sore throats, aiding in digestion, and even improving cognitive function.

Title: Gluten-Free Lasagna Sheets
Description:
Each soft and chewy, no-boil, oven-ready pasta sheet, authentically crafted in Italy, allows you to build a complex and layered dish with a better-for-you Lasagna. Made with just one ingredient, 100% yellow peas including the skins, each 3 oz serving delivers 17 g of protein and 11 g of fiber plus key vitamins and minerals, for nutritious, gluten-free lasagna dishes without sacrificing the taste and texture you love.
 
Ingredients
Whole yellow peas (with skin).
Cooking Instructions
ZENB Lasagna is a no-boil, oven-ready pasta. Simply add it to your dish while assembling your casserole. For best results, make sure your lasagna filling has plenty of sauce as this is what helps cook your noodles.
Most lasagna casseroles take between 40-60 minutes to fully book. When the noodles are cooked through, you should notice the sauce boiling around the edges of the pan. You may want to insert a toothpick into the lasagna to check for doneness. If the toothpick goes in easily without a lot of resistance, the noodles are done.
Net Weight: 8 oz

[Iced] Put ¼ Cup (43g) instant tea mix in a 12fl oz cup and dissolve with a small amount of hot water. Add cold water and Ice. Stir well. Adjust for desired concentration. May be made with milk for a richer flavor.

Title: Laundry Detergent Pods (24 Pack)
Description:
MUJI By Public Goods laundry detergent pods offer a natural way to get bright, soft and supremely clean clothes. Though it's made entirely of plants, it's formulated to tackle even the toughest stains, without using anything unhealthy for you or the environment. Our hypoallergenic, dermatologist-tested formula doesn't contain any of the harmful chemicals or synthetic fragrance common in many detergents and it's ideal for sensitive skin. Our laundry detergent pods come as a single, pre-measured power pack that's tidy, easy to travel with and works in hot or cold water.


24 water-soluble pods containing soda ash.

sodium lauryl sulfates, dyes, ethanolamines (MEA/DEA/TEA), chlorine bleach, parabens, synthetic fragrance, sodium lauryl sulfates, phthalates or anything from formaldehyde.

This product is fragrance-free, graywater-friendly and biodegradable. Made for both HE and standard washing machines. Contains 0% dyes and is free of synthetic fragrances and artificial brighteners. Made for sensitive skin. Resealable pouch.

Title: Beech Wood Stool with Round Legs
Description:
Wooden stool made from upcycled imperfect materials. Features irregular shades of color and striping.
Even if the appearance of the furniture is uneven, high-quality materials are processed by Japanese craftsmen with the latest technology. Made with solid beech wood and treated with urethane resin coating.
*Assembly not required.
Care Instructions
Product details:
['Style Code: ', 'Measurements:
Dimensions: Approx. W20.7 x D13.4 x H17.3" (W52.5 x D34.0 x H44.0 cm)

Item weight: Approx. 12 lbs (5.5 kg)

Withstanding Load: Approx. 264.6 lbs (120 kg)', 'Country/Region of Origin: Japan']
Materials & care:
['Body: Solid Beech Wood
Coating: Urethane Resin Coating.', '- Contains Formaldehyde Absorption Sheet

- Make sure to tighten or re-secure loose screws.

- Please make sure the room is well-ventilated when unboxing. May contain trace amounts of formaldehyde. Sensitive individuals and infants may experience allergic symptoms.

- Avoid direct sunlight and exposure to heat from air conditioners or wind, which may cause warping, cracking or discoloration.

- Please avoid using alcohol with the product. If disinfectant containing alcohol drips onto the tabletop, please wipe it off immediately. Concentrated alcohol may discolor or deteriorate the surface coating.

- Gently remove dust from the surface using a soft cloth or duster.

- If there's heavy dirt, use a cloth soaked in 3-5% diluted neutral detergent, then wipe off immediately with a cloth soaked in water, wipe with a dry cloth and let air dry.']

Title: Men's Cool Touch Henley Neck Short Sleeve Woven Patterned T-Shirt
Description:

Title: Men's Cool Touch Short Sleeve Woven T-Shirt
Description:
Stay cool & protected on bright, hot days with our Men's Cool Touch Short Sleeve Woven T-Shirt. Versatile for a variety of occasions, this shirt is ideal for everyday wear and business casual wear. 
Designed with function and style in mind, the outer surface is made with tightly twisted organic cotton yarn, while the reverse side is made with double-layered polyester yarn to help you stay cool and protected from UV rays. The t-shirt's fabric is made to be light yet firm, making it hard to see through. It is also quick-drying and crease-resistant, making it easy to care for. 

[What is Cool Touch?]
We use a unique cotton or polyester yarn shape to increase thermal conductivity so that the fabric can quickly absorb heat and diffuse sweat, creating a cold contact feel.
The knitting process and the unique thread shape also make the fabric reflect UV rays, effective in protecting the skin.

Title: Women's Stretchy Hemp Mix Jumpsuit
Description:
Spring into effortless and sustainable style with our Women's Stretchy Hemp Mix Jumpsuit. The hemp texture and spandex allows for freer movement and a relaxed feel with its moderately stretchy material and comfortable all-day wear while staying stylish. It comes with a belt so you can change the silhouette depending on your mood.
Go on a picnic with friends and celebrate the good weather or wear it on your next office day.
Try pairing it with our Sneaker Sandals for a sporty and urban look.
[What is Hemp]

Hemp is a natural fiber that can be cultivated with minimal environmental impact. It needs little to no irrigation and uses less fertilizer than other crops.
Getting more attention as a new alternative to linen and cotton, hemp, which has been used in Japan for the thongs of geta for a long time, has excellent breathability and quick-drying properties.

Title: Women's Soybean Fiber Ribbed Crew Neck Sweater
Description:
Made from knitted soy pulp for a soft texture, making it gentle and comfortable to wear. The rib design adds an elegant touch that can also be worn casually. Although the silhouette is small, it has good stretch so it fits well without constricting your body.
Our new Soybean Fiber Blend Knitwear is made using a sustainable and renewable soy protein fiber, made from the sediment of naturally produced soybean oil. The fabric is soft and lightweight. Its moisture absorption is comparable to cotton, while also being more breathable.
In colder weather, we recommend wearing it with a thin inner layer.

Title: Laundry Detergent Pods (24 Pack)
Description:
MUJI By Public Goods laundry detergent pods offer a natural way to get bright, soft and supremely clean clothes. Though it's made entirely of plants, it's formulated to tackle even the toughest stains, without using anything unhealthy for you or the environment. Our hypoallergenic, dermatologist-tested formula doesn't contain any of the harmful chemicals or synthetic fragrance common in many detergents and it's ideal for sensitive skin. Our laundry detergent pods come as a single, pre-measured power pack that's tidy, easy to travel with and works in hot or cold water.


Made with: 24 water-soluble pods containing soda ash.

Made without: sodium lauryl sulfates, dyes, ethanolamines (MEA/DEA/TEA), chlorine bleach, parabens, synthetic fragrance, sodium lauryl sulfates, phthalates or anything from formaldehyde.

This product is fragrance-free, graywater-friendly and biodegradable. Made for both HE and standard washing machines. Contains 0% dyes and is free of synthetic fragrances and artificial brighteners. Made for sensitive skin. Resealable pouch.
Ingredients:
All Natural, Baby Safe, Biodegradable, Fragrance Free.

Title: Clear Care Moisturizing Milk
Description:
A skincare series that uses natural water from Kamaishi, Iwate Prefecture. This series aims to tone and rebalance skin that's prone to uneven texture and visible pores, promoting a healthier complexion. It contains four fruit extracts, including centella asiatica and grapefruit extract, known for their moisturizing benefits.
This moisturizing milk leaves your skin feeling refreshed and plump.
⚬ No synthetic fragrance added ⚬ No coloring ⚬ No mineral oil ⚬ Weakly acidic ⚬ Paraben-free ⚬ Alcohol-free
◎ How To Use: After applying lotion and toner, take an appropriate amount into your palms and spread over your entire face.
Product details: ['Country/Region of Origin: Japan']
Materials & care:
['Bottle: PET
Cap: Polypropylene

Ingredients:
Water, glycerin, dimethicone, cetyl ethylhexanoate, sunflower seed oil, PEG-75, pentylene glycol, propanediol, triethylhexanoin, glyceryl stearate, polyquaternium-51, tuberose extract, grape fruit extract, apple fruit extract, shikwasha peel extract, loquat leaf extract, sodium hyaluronate, allantoin, arginine, glycosyl trehalose, hydrolyzed hydrogenated starch, BG, PG, ethylhexylglycerin, behenyl alcohol, dimethicone crosspolymer, stearic PEG-75 stearate, polysorbate 80, carbomer, tocopherol, EDTA-4Na, phenoxyethanol, fragrance', '- Use in conjunction with MUJI Clear Care Series.

- Use with care to avoid skin irritation.

- Do not use if you have skin problems or the product does not agree with your skin.

- If you notice redness, swelling, itching, irritation, color loss (e.g., vitiligo), dark spots, or other abnormalities during use, or if you notice similar symptoms after exposing your skin to direct sunlight, discontinue use and consult a dermatologist or other healthcare professional. Continued use may aggravate symptoms.

- Do not use on areas with scars, rashes, eczema, or other skin problems.

- If this product enters eyes, wash out immediately with water.

- If adverse reactions such as irritation occur during or after use, it is recommended that you stop using the product and consult a dermatologist, etc.

- Keep out of reach of children.

- Do not store in extremely high heat or low temperatures or direct sunlight.

- The color and fragrance may vary due to the natural ingredients, but this does not affect the quality of the product. ']

Title: Women's Cool Touch Boat Neck Short Sleeve T-Shirt
Description:
Get active with our Cool Touch Boat Neck Short Sleeve T-Shirt! The fabric is knitted with a polyester yarn, resulting in a breathable, cool-touch feeling when worn, ideal for wearing for exercise and workouts, and while playing sports. Available in light and neutral colors for the minimalist and energetic athlete.
[What is Cool Touch?]

We use a unique cotton or polyester yarn shape to increase thermal conductivity so that the fabric can quickly absorb heat and diffuse sweat, creating a cold contact feel.

The knitting process and the unique thread shape also make the fabric reflect UV rays, effective in protecting the skin.

Title: Men's Kapok Blend Jacket
Description:
A jacket made with a blend of organic cotton and kapok, an environmentally friendly plant grown without pesticides. By using a fabric that mixes kapok with cotton, it is softer and lighter than conventional 100% cotton.

The fiber harvested from kapok nuts is a material with minimal environmental impact that can be cultivated with little fertilizer and water without pesticides. Because the fiber inside is hollow, it is light and contains a lot of air.

Product details:
['Style Code: ', 'Measurements:

['Body: Solid Beech Wood
Coating: Urethane Resin Coating.', '- Contains Formaldehyde Absorption Sheet

- Make sure to tighten or re-secure loose screws.

- Please make sure the room is well-ventilated when unboxing. May contain trace amounts of formaldehyde. Sensitive individuals and infants may experience allergic symptoms.

- Avoid direct sunlight and exposure to heat from air conditioners or wind, which may cause warping, cracking or discoloration.

- Please avoid using alcohol with the product. If disinfectant containing alcohol drips onto the tabletop, please wipe it off immediately. Concentrated alcohol may discolor or deteriorate the surface coating.

- Gently remove dust from the surface using a soft cloth or duster.

- If there's heavy dirt, use a cloth soaked in 3-5% diluted neutral detergent, then wipe off immediately with a cloth soaked in water, wipe with a dry cloth and let air dry.']

Title: Oscillating Circulator Fan
Description:
An oscillating fan that improves air circulation and ventilation efficiency in your home, helping you feel more comfortable and refreshed. It can be used all year round combined with air conditioning or heating to direct airflow in the room.
The fan conveniently memorizes the set angle and air volume level, and automatically returns to the front when it is turned off.
You can also use it to enjoy the scent of essential oils by adding 2-3 drops to the aroma pad, located in the center cap on the front of the fan.
*This product is not covered by Warranty. Please carefully read the attached manual when doing initial setup or troubleshooting. Avoid any misuse listed in the warnings. Contact help@muji.com if you encounter any issues or defects.
User Guide (PDF: 1.4MB) *Japanese language only. English and French version is included in the product package.

Materials & care:
['ABS Resin, PP Resin', '- Model: MJ-CIS18US

- Effective Area: 313.88 ft² (29.16 m²)

- 3 air volume levels:
- 1: Weak
- 2: Medium
- 3: Strong

- Voltage: AC120V

- Power Consumption: 30 W (60 Hz)

- Noise Level: <45 dB (at max airflow operation)
40~45 dB reference: Late night in the city, in the library, during the day in a quiet residential area.

- Aroma pads are replaceable. Approx. replacement time is every 2 years. If the pad gets dirty or damaged, please replace it.

- The front guard (air outlet), back guard (suction port), and blades can be removed.


/!\ Warnings /!\

- If a large amount of dust adheres to it, it may cause a decrease in air volume, noise, and vibration. Please clean it regularly.

- Please carefully read the attached manual when doing initial setup or troubleshooting.

- Please DO NOT try to manually adjust the fan position, as it may damage the motor.

- Do not use without the front guard.

- Do not use a utility knife to open the package. There is a risk of damaging the product.']

Title: Ikebana: The Zen Way of Flowers
Description:
It's all about light, texture, color, shape and balance!
Filled with inspiring images of unconventional flower arrangements, this new book by Japanese Ikebana master Yuji Ueno shows you how to use light and position as well as color, shape and texture--of both flowers and vessel--to make inexpensive floral arrangements that convey a Zen sense of simplicity, calm and balance.
Ueno's arrangements are informal, but authentic and true to the original wabi-sabi spirit of Ikebana practiced by Zen Buddhist masters of the art. In this book you'll receive:
Ueno's unique approach makes it clear that you don't need special training, expensive equipment or store-bought flowers to create beautiful arrangements. All you need is an open mind, a sense of awareness--and a good set of clippers--to create Ikebana that are truly unique, expressive and uplifting.
The Zen art of flower arranging is now accessible to everyone!
 
Authors: Yuji Ueno
Publisher: Tuttle Publishing
Hardcover: 208 pages
Dimensions: 7.8 x 0.7 x 10.2" (19.7 x 1.9 x 26 cm)
Language: English

Title: Happy Bonsai: Choose It, Shape It, Love It
Description:
Begin your lifelong love affair with the mindful art of bonsai.
Do you know your shari from your nebari? Can you tell literati styling from informal upright? Want to know how to create that gnarled and twisted look?
Let Happy Bonsai guide you along the path to enlightenment, with care and display profiles for 40 top trees and fully illustrated step-by-step of more than 20 bonsai techniques and styles.
Find your perfect tree and discover how to prune, shape, and tend to its needs to create a beautiful living sculpture. Fall in love with this most meditative of garden crafts.
 
Authors: Tran, Michael
Publisher: Dorling Kindersley
Hardcover: 144 pages
Dimensions: 6.1 x 0.7 x 7.9" (15.6 x 1.7 x 20 cm)
Language: English

Title: GINZA
Description:
In April 2019, MUJI's world flagship store opened in Ginza, a key hub of commerce and culture in Japan. To celebrate our first year in business, we've launched a guidebook project that aims to showcase a local Ginza unlike any before, as part of our commitment to embrace the area's unique character.
Our team conducted thorough research on delectable set meals, hidden back alleys, public bathhouses in the red light district, and quaint bars that open at 3pm. The result is a pocket-sized book that brings you on a journey to discover a vibrant and wholesome Ginza that caters to both residents and tourists.
Language: ﻿Bilingual (English & Japanese)

Title: Cup Of Therapy
Description:
We discovered "Cup Of Therapy" in Finland. This is a world created by illustrator/graphic designer Matti Pickjamsa and psychotherapist Antti Ervasti with animal illustrations and short humorous texts. Many of the themes were born from their daily lives, such as the cafes they frequented or the worries of close friends. “Cup Of Therapy, it’s okay. In addition to 100 illustrations and copies of the original book, this book also includes Japanese translations of newly written explanatory texts to help you get closer to the theme.
Language: Japanese

Title: Tinker
Description:
Keiichi Sumi, an artist who transforms discarded items into art, uses improvisation and assembles various materials to repurpose them. This book features his collection of works created between 2000 and 2022.
Language: Japanese

Available in a variety of colors and patterns to match any occasion or mood, this is the perfect every day shirt for the warmer season. You can style it unbuttoned over a t-shirt or button up and wear it on its own.

Title: Men's Cool Touch Henley Neck Short Sleeve Woven Patterned T-Shirt
Description:
Stay cool & protected on bright, hot days with our Men's Cool Touch Henley Neck Short Sleeve Woven T-Shirt.
Henley necks are characterized by its round, collarless neckline with a flap or opening at the center which creates a flattering look when worn.
Designed with function and style in mind, the outer surface is made with a tightly twisted organic cotton yarn, while the reverse side is made with a double-layered polyester yarn to help you stay cool and protected from UV rays. The t-shirt's fabric is made to be light yet firm, making it hard to see through. It is also quick drying and crease-resistant, making it easy to care for.
Versatile for a variety of occasions, this shirt is ideal for everyday wear and business casual wear. Put together an outfit with our Bottoms or layer under our Jackets for rainy days and more formal attire.
[What is Cool Touch?]
We use a unique cotton or polyester yarn shape to increase thermal conductivity so that the fabric can quickly absorb heat and diffuse sweat, creating a cold contact feel.
The knitting process and the unique thread shape also makes the fabric reflect UV rays, effective in protecting the skin.

Title: Men's Cool Touch Henley Neck Short Sleeve Woven T-Shirt
Description:
Stay cool & protected on bright, hot days with our Men's Cool Touch Henley Neck Short Sleeve Woven T-Shirt.
Henley necks are characterized by its round, collarless neckline with a flap or opening at the center which creates a flattering look when worn.
Designed with function and style in mind, the outer surface is made with a tightly twisted organic cotton yarn, while the reverse side is made with a double-layered polyester yarn to help you stay cool and protected from UV rays. The t-shirt's fabric is made to be light yet firm, making it hard to see through. It is also quick drying and crease-resistant, making it easy to care for.
Versatile for a variety of occasions, this shirt is ideal for everyday wear and business casual wear. Put together an outfit with our Bottoms or layer under our Jackets for rainy days and more formal attire.
[What is Cool Touch?]
We use a unique cotton or polyester yarn shape to increase thermal conductivity so that the fabric can quickly absorb heat and diffuse sweat, creating a cold contact feel.
The knitting process and the unique thread shape also makes the fabric reflect UV rays, effective in protecting the skin.

Title: Deodorized Memory Foam Pillow
Description:
The outer fabric is washed easily and has been exposed to a deodorizing process. Made with low rebound urethane foam that provides gradual sinking. The filling of the side fabric is equipped with a deodorant function that eliminates sweat and aging odors like acetic acid and ammonia. Retains its deodorizing capabilities even after 100 washes.
Standard pillow size in Japan is 16.9 x 24.8" (43 x 63 cm). Perfect for single/twin/full-size beds. Fits well with MUJI pillowcases.

['Measurements:
Standard: 16.9 x 24.8" (43 x 63 cm)
\nIdeal for twin/single beds.', 'Country/Region of Origin: China']
Materials & care:
['Outer Shell: 100% Polyester
Wadding: 100% Polyester
Padding: Polyurethane Foam', '- The cover can be removed for washing.

- Urethane foam is flammable; do not expose to open flames (e. g. lit cigarettes) or sources of high temperature (e. g. heaters).

- The main body cannot be washed at home or dry cleaned. If it gets dirty, dilute the detergent, apply it to a towel, and wipe it off by tapping it. Then wipe off the detergent with a towel soaked in water and let it dry immediately.

- Discoloration of the urethane foam does not affect the performance of the product. Due to the characteristics of the materials, the product has a smell at the beginning of use. If this is bothersome, air in a well-ventilated, shady place.

- Depending on storage conditions, urethane foam may deteriorate, such as strength being reduced, in 2 to 5 years. Avoid high temperature and humidity and store in a place with good ventilation.

- Make sure to use with the cover on.

- Due to the characteristics of the material, cracks may appear on the surface of the urethane foam. Be careful when handling outer shell.

- The surface of the urethane foam has air bubbles. This is due to the manufacturing process and will not affect the use.']

Title: Gluten-Free Lasagna Sheets
Description:
Each soft and chewy, no-boil, oven-ready pasta sheet, authentically crafted in Italy, allows you to build a complex and layered dish with a better-for-you Lasagna. Made with just one ingredient, 100% yellow peas including the skins, each 3 oz serving delivers 17 g of protein and 11 g of fiber plus key vitamins and minerals, for nutritious, gluten-free lasagna dishes without sacrificing the taste and texture you love.
 
Ingredients
Whole yellow peas (with skin).
Cooking Instructions
ZENB Lasagna is a no-boil, oven-ready pasta. Simply add it to your dish while assembling your casserole. For best results, make sure your lasagna filling has plenty of sauce as this is what helps cook your noodles.
Most lasagna casseroles take between 40-60 minutes to fully book. When the noodles are cooked through, you should notice the sauce boiling around the edges of the pan. You may want to insert a toothpick into the lasagna to check for doneness. If the toothpick goes in easily without a lot of resistance, the noodles are done.
Net Weight: 8 oz

Title: Oscillating Circulator Fan
Description:
An oscillating fan that improves air circulation and ventilation efficiency in your home, helping you feel more comfortable and refreshed. It can be used all year round combined with air conditioning or heating to direct airflow in the room.
The fan conveniently memorizes the set angle and air volume level, and automatically returns to the front when it is turned off.
You can also use it to enjoy the scent of essential oils by adding 2-3 drops to the aroma pad, located in the center cap on the front of the fan.
*This product is not covered by Warranty. Please carefully read the attached manual when doing initial setup or troubleshooting. Avoid any misuse listed in the warnings. Contact help@muji.com if you encounter any issues or defects.

Title: Down Thin Duvet
Description:
A duvet made with gray duck down and feathers covered in light, thin fabric for compact storage.

This thin duvet with a down fill power of 400, can be used all year round. With its thin feature it's suitable for summer, and in combination with single or double layer comforter from autumn to spring.

The stitching on the duvet allows filling and feathers to stay in place and not gather at the corner. The fabric is anti-static processed.

The corners of each duvet have a fabric ring so every corner can stay connected with the MUJI duvet cover.

With its thin feathers, users can easily fold the duvet into the case to be convenient to carry and store in the closet.

Title: Lyocell Duvet Cover
Description:
Made from lyocell, this duvet cover makes the fabric flexible, durable, and resistant to wrinkles. Lyocell is 50% more absorbent than cotton, and has good moisture-wicking properties, keeping you dry and cool. The smoothness and cool touch of the fabric are perfect for summer.
The neutral colors complement any interior design and give your room a natural look while blending with warm and cold hues. Our duvet cover has inner button tapes to keep the duvet in place and prevent it from shifting. It also has open holes on the top sides to allow you to grab and tie the duvet with button tapes easily.

Title: Everyday Tableware Oval Plate Small
Description:
A versatile oval porcelain plate that is easy to place on the dining table and easy to serve in a variety of ways.
The horizontal oval shape is a well-balanced way to serve one-dish dishes and ingredients such as grilled fish and asparagus. The flat shape with edges makes it easy to combine small tableware such as cups and bowls on the plate, making it more enjoyable to serve each ingredient. The edges are curved at an angle that makes it easy to fit in the hand when lifting and moving the dish.
Our new Everyday Tableware series features lightweight, microwave and dishwasher-safe tableware. The pieces are designed for everyday convenience, while also elevating the presentation of the dish. Available in a variety of sizes, colors and shapes so you can enjoy them in any combination. This collection is the perfect addition to bring elegance to your dinner table!
